title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Database Would Your AI Agents Choose -  Escape the Frankenstack (DAT203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代理会选择什么数据库 - 摆脱混合技术栈 (DAT203)
abstract: Most AI agents run on a stitched-together mix of vector stores, search engines, OLAP systems, and pipelines. It works — until you need real-time reasoning, consistent multi-modal results, or to scale without latency. Hidden costs pile up: data movement, overhead, and specialized skills just to keep it running. In this lightning talk, we’ll share optimizations to the standard approach, highlight signs it’s breaking down, and reveal a unified design that starts from the agent’s needs. Learn how to unify structured, unstructured, and vector data to build and deploy agents faster — without the Frankenstack. This presentation is brought to you by SingleStore, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 大多数AI代理运行在拼凑的向量存储、搜索引擎、OLAP系统和管道混合体上。这种方式有效——直到您需要实时推理、一致的多模态结果或无延迟扩展。隐藏成本不断累积：数据移动、开销以及仅为保持运行所需的专业技能。在这次闪电演讲中，我们将分享标准方法的优化，突出其崩溃的征象，并揭示从代理需求出发的统一设计。了解如何统一结构化、非结构化和向量数据，以更快地构建和部署代理——无需Frankenstack。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SingleStore为您呈现。
